snippet: On Tuesday in The Times, articles about a student loan rate that is set to rise (again), the return of a morning sickness drug and a surprise path to a better sex life — hip surgery.
abstract: On Tuesday in The Times, articles about a student loan rate that is set to rise (again), the return of a morning sickness drug and a surprise path to a better sex life — hip surgery.

headline.main: Tuesday Reading: Hip Surgery for a Better Sex Life
